從現在起每天吃薑黃 一個月後會有什麼驚人發現（視頻）

01 Nov 2019, 03:12

【新唐人北京時間2019年11月01日訊】從現在起每天吃薑黃，一個月後會有什麼驚人發現？
時間戳記：你的牙齒會變白 0:59告別惱人的痘痘粉刺 2:03讓秀髮長得又快又強韌 3:19提高你的免疫力 4:13舒緩喉嚨痛也靠它5:21和感冒說再見吧！ 6:00治療外傷及破損的皮膚 6:33有效減輕關節疼痛 7:24刺激腦部，並改善你的心情 8:16幫助預防癌症 9:14活化你的年輕肌膚 10:04能夠幫助你減重 10:59

text:
Eating turmeric every day from now on, what will be amazing after a month (video)

01 Nov 2019, 03:12

[New Tang Dynasty, Beijing time, November 01, 2019] From now on, I will eat turmeric every day. What surprises will be discovered in a month?
Timestamp: Your teeth will turn white 0:59 bid farewell to the annoying acne acne 2:03 let the hair grow fast and strong 3:19 improve your immunity 4:13 soothing sore throat also depends on it 5: 21 Say goodbye to the cold! 6:00 Treatment of traumatic and damaged skin 6:33 Effectively relieve joint pain 7:24 Stimulate the brain and improve your mood 8:16 Help prevent cancer 9:14 Activate your young skin 10:04 can help you lose weight 10:59
